name: Relief
description:
A humorous take on the theme of "What Home Means to You" developed by four people at the DelhiNCR Global Game Jam 2019 jam site.

Home is relief. And the ability to relieve yourself in peace.

You will face two kinds of challenges. Balance must be maintained by hitting the arrow keys in the given sequence and bugs must be swatted away by clicking on them with your hand.

Credits:
Abhishek Khade - 3D models
Inderdeep Singh - Programming, UI art
Sri Ganesh - Scene Lighting, Technical Art
Ujwal Kumar - Programming, Audio
